description:
11.7 avgblur
Apply average blur filter.

The filter accepts the following options:

planes.description: Set which planes to filter. By default all planes are filtered.

sizeY.description: Set vertical radius size, if zero it will be same as sizeX. Default is 0.

name: avgblur

parameters.description: Set which planes to filter. By default all planes are filtered.
parameters.name: planes

parameters.description: Set vertical radius size, if zero it will be same as sizeX. Default is 0.
parameters.name: sizeY

source:
11.7 avgblur

Apply average blur filter.

The filter accepts the following options:

sizeX

Set horizontal radius size.

planes

Set which planes to filter. By default all planes are filtered.

sizeY

Set vertical radius size, if zero it will be same as sizeX. Default is 0.
